text: Ronald Knot (born August 8, 1994) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for HC Bílí Tygři Liberec of the Czech Extraliga. Knot made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Slavia Praha during the 2012–13 Czech Extraliga season and has also played for BK Mladá Boleslav and Piráti Chomutov. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen Category:BK Mladá Boleslav players Category:Piráti Chomutov players Category:HC Slavia Praha players Category:Sportspeople from Prague
title: Ronald Knot
